h1.a: phpBB ‚Ä¢ Free and Open Source Forum Software

p.a: Learn about the features that phpBB has to offer.

Official tools by the phpBB team to assist you with your board

Our customisation database contains just about everything you might need to customise your phpBB board to your liking. In it you will find Extensions, MODs (for 3.0.x), Styles, Language Packs, BBCodes, as well as various tools.
Guides on how to use them and how to create your own.

All Development Discussion takes place at Area51. Bug tracker, development wiki, continuous integration and other development tools are located here. Find out how to get involved in phpBB development.
Report problems with phpBB core and other sub-projects such as the Website, Customisation DB, and Team Tools here.
Suggest, vote on and comment on ideas for phpBB.
The tracker for security issues in phpBB or validated MODs.
Share experience and learn more about the codebase.
Google Summer of Code is an annual program in which Google awards stipends to students participating in coding projects for free and open source software projects.

h2.a: How to create Tags / Categories for different Topics

div.div: Get help with installation and running phpBB 3.0.x here. Please do not post bug reports, feature requests, or MOD-related questions here.

a.title: This topic is locked, you cannot edit posts or make further replies.

h3.a: How to create Tags / Categories for different Topics

div.div: I like to display a horizontal list of tags / categories assigned to different Topics. On click this, users can view only Topic titles. Is it possible?

h3.a: Re: How to create Tags / Categories for different Topics

div.div: Not sure what you mean, can you explain a bit more please?

li.span: "The more connected we get the more alone we become‚Äù - Kyle Broflovski¬©

h3.a: Re: How to create Tags / Categories for different Topics

div.div:
Just like categories in Wordpress blog.
Board
--Forum
----Topic 1 about Cat
----Topic 2 about Rat
----Topic 3 about Cat
----Topic 4 about Rat
----Topic 5 about Tiger
Few buttons near footer: CAT, RAT, TIGER
Users when click 'RAT' then he /she may view:
Board
--Forum
----Topic 2 about Rat
----Topic 4 about Rat

h3.a: Re: How to create Tags / Categories for different Topics
Re: How to create Tags / Categories for different Topics

div.div:
wbxpress wrote:Can anyone help me please. this is not something that phpbb does. it does not have "tags" like a blog does.
you would have to try to find someone to write up a MOD for something like this.
try the MOD release forum and/or the MOD request forum here.
robert
